meanings.sent1: The elephant was the bulkiest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The bulkiest package was difficult to lift.
meanings.sent3: The bulkiest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent4: His bulkiest sweater kept him warm in the cold winter.
meanings.sent5: The bulkiest cloud in the sky signaled an incoming storm.

meanings.definition: Taking up a lot of space
meanings.sent1: The bulkiest furniture in the room was the sofa.
meanings.sent2: The bulkiest suitcase barely fit in the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent3: The bulkiest book on the shelf was too heavy to move.
meanings.sent4: Her bulkiest collection of shoes filled the entire closet.
meanings.sent5: The bulkiest tree in the garden shaded the entire backyard.

meanings.definition: Having a large and heavy body
meanings.sent1: The bulkiest wrestler in the ring easily overpowered his opponent.
meanings.sent2: The bulkiest bear in the forest lumbered through the trees.
meanings.sent3: The bulkiest man at the gym lifted weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her bulkiest cat stretched lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The bulkiest vehicle on the road caused a traffic jam.
